tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_date DATE,
  land_use_category VARCHAR(50),
  impact_description TEXT,
  assessment_author VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
	assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	location_id UUID,
	assessment_date DATE,
	impact_type VARCHAR(50),
	assessment_result JSON
);

CREATE TABLE land_use_data (
	location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	land_type VARCHAR(50),
	area HSTORE,
	water_source VARCHAR(100),
	usage_history JSON
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  impact_type VARCHAR(100),
  assessment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE land_use_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  land_type VARCHAR(255),
  land_owner VARCHAR(100),
  land_area DECIMAL(10,2),
  land_use_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE assessment_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_id INT,
  land_id INT,
  impact_score INT,
  assessment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sustainable_development_practices (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  practice_name VARCHAR(255),
  practice_description TEXT,
  implementation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    assessment_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE land_use_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    land_type VARCHAR(50),
    land_area DOUBLE,
    land_owner VARCHAR(100),
    classification VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE sustainable_practices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    practice_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    implementation_date DATE,
    success_rate DOUBLE
)

CREATE TABLE assessment_land_relationship (
    assessment_id INT,
    land_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact_assessment(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (land_id) REFERENCES land_use_data(id)
)

CREATE TABLE practice_assessment_relationship (
    practice_id INT,
    assessment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (practice_id) REFERENCES sustainable_practices(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact_assessment(id)
)
